name: Running from outer space
description:
A fun Multiplayer game where you shoot to make other people fall! try not to fall as you run out of space!

Can be played locally, online or a singleplayer mode where you try to survive for as long as you can until you run into space!

Play with keyboard and mouse or controller!

WASD/Left Joystick: Move
Mouse/Right Joystick: Move Camera
Shift/Left trigger: Dash
Left Click/ Right trigger: Shoot

Multiplayer online with steam just host a game and other people will be able to join as long a you have steam installed.
Also play split screen multiplayer with a keyboard and up to 3 controllers.
Or single player survive mode.

Meant to be played with friends!
